---
title: 'MessageGroup'
slug: 'react/components/message-group'
implementationOf: 'Message Group'
---

```jsx
<MessageGroup>
    <Message kind="success">You've successfully placed your order.</Message>
    <Message>Remember to pick up your order tomorrow at 3pm.</Message>
    <Message kind="warning">There is no phone number associated with this order.</Message>
    <Message kind="error">The ice cream you selected was not available.</Message>
</MessageGroup>
```
